metadata.title: CVE-2021-22876 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: curl 7.1.1 to and including 7.75.0 is vulnerable to an "Exposure of Private Personal Information to an Unauthorized Actor" by leaking credentials in the HTTP Referer: header. libcurl does not strip off user credentials from the URL when automatically populating the Referer: HTTP request header field in outgoing HTTP requests, and therefore risks leaking sensitive data to the server that is the target of the second HTTP request.

notes.note: amurray> affects curl versions between 7.1.1 and 7.75.0

criterions.comment: curl package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.74.0-1ubuntu2').
